              </a>
             </li>

               Global Pop
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12725472">
              <a id="link_12725472" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/musichistoryone" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12725472,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Citation Guides'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12725472});">
               Music History I
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12725482">
              <a id="link_12725482" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/musichistorytwo" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12725482,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Citation Guides'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12725482});">

              </a>

         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10463290">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citation Tools
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10463290">
          <div id="boxatt10463290" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12725561">
              <a id="link_12725561" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/media/content,assets/library/docs/chicago_example.pdf" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12725561,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Citation Guides'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344767}); ">
               Chicago Style Guide
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A tip sheet for citing in the Chicago style.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12717604">
              <a id="link_12717604" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/media/content,assets/library/docs/mla_example.pdf" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717604,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Citation Guides'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717604}); ">
               MLA Style Guide
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A tip sheet for citing in the MLA style.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12717605">
              <a id="link_12717605" href="https://www.zotero.org/support/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12717605,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Music', 'page_name' : 'Citation Guides'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717605}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Zotero is a free, easy-to-use Firefox extension to help you collect, manage, and cite your research sources. This handout will help you get started.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
